sentences.en: Conflict between management and workers makes for inefficiency in the workplace.
sentences.cn: 资方与工人之间的冲突使得工厂生产效率很低.

sentences.en: Dread at her own inefficiency crept upon her.
sentences.cn: 害怕自己能力薄弱的感觉浮上了心头.

sentences.en: Every office has its share of favoritism, inefficiency and dumb decisions.
sentences.cn: 每个公司都有他的偏袒、无效率和愚蠢的决定。

sentences.en: He is losing by his inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 他因自己能力差而受到损失.

sentences.en: He received serious critical comments on his inefficiency in the work.
sentences.cn: 他由于工作效率低而受到严厉批评.

sentences.en: I can't accept inefficiency and incompetence even if I like the person.
sentences.cn: 我不能接受那些低效率和无能力的人,即便我喜欢找个人.

sentences.en: I was fuming at their inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 我正因为他们效率低而发火.

sentences.en: In his speech he kept pounding away at his opponent's inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 他在演说中不断攻击他的对手不称职.

sentences.en: In the long run, being shielded from takeover breeds inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 从长期来看, 免于被收购造成了低效.

sentences.en: It is the ultimate testimony to the gross inefficiency of markets.
sentences.cn: 这最终宣告了市场的总体无效.

sentences.en: Norway also had demanding voters to limit waste and inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 挪威也要求选民减少浪费和低效.

sentences.en: One day in a crowded elevator, someone remarked on its inefficiency.
sentences.cn: 一天,电梯里很拥挤, 有人抱怨电梯效率太低.

sentences.en: The manager was discharged for inefficiency.
This type of inefficiency arises because workers and management are ill - equipped.
sentences.cn: 出现此种低效率是因为工人与管理层都能力不足.

sentences.en: We've been badly hung if through the inefficiency of the post office.
sentences.cn: 我们都受过邮局工作效率不高的苦.

words.tran_cn: 无效率的，效率低的；无能的

trans.tran_cn: 无效率，无能，无效率事例
